entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 10:41 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
